name: Claims Processing
description: End-to-end management of insurance claims from filing through settlement, including assessment, investigation, and payment processing.

name: Underwriting
description: Evaluation of insurance applications, risk assessment, policy pricing, and approval decisions for life, health, and P&C products.

name: Actuarial Science
description: Mathematical and statistical analysis of insurance risk, pricing models, reserve calculations, and financial forecasting.

name: Life Insurance Products
description: Deep knowledge of term life, whole life, universal life, and variable life insurance products, features, and underwriting criteria.

name: Health Insurance Products
description: Expertise in health insurance plans including HMO, PPO, EPO, HDHP, and medical underwriting principles.

name: Property & Casualty Insurance
description: Knowledge of homeowners, auto, commercial property, liability, and specialty P&C insurance products and underwriting.

name: Risk Assessment
description: Systematic evaluation of insurable risks, hazard identification, and mitigation strategies across insurance lines.

name: Policy Administration
description: Management of policy lifecycle including issuance, renewals, endorsements, cancellations, and customer service.

name: Fraud Detection
description: Identification and investigation of fraudulent claims and applications using analytical and investigative techniques.

name: Medical Underwriting
description: Assessment of applicant health status, medical history, and risk factors for health and life insurance underwriting.

name: Loss Control
description: Risk reduction strategies and loss prevention consulting for policyholders to minimize insurance claims.

name: Reinsurance
description: Management of reinsurance treaties, cessions, and recovery processes to manage company risk exposure.

name: Catastrophe Management
description: Response and recovery planning for large-scale disasters and catastrophic events affecting multiple policyholders.

name: Customer Service Excellence
description: Delivery of high-quality customer support across multiple channels including phone, email, chat, and in-person.

name: AI-Powered Claims Automation
description: Implementation and management of AI systems for automated claims triage, assessment, and decision-making.

name: Predictive Analytics for Underwriting
description: Use of machine learning models to predict risk and optimize underwriting decisions and pricing.

name: Natural Language Processing
description: Application of NLP techniques to extract insights from unstructured claims data, medical records, and customer communications.

name: Generative AI Implementation
description: Development and deployment of generative AI models for document generation, customer service, and content creation.

name: Insurance Regulation (State)

name: NAIC Compliance
